name: testWorkshop
goal: The goal of this learning journey is to learn about how to create secure passwords and why 2FA is of utmost importance.

step.name: Password security
step.goal: The student knows what attributes make passwords secure.
step.behavior: Explain to the student the different features that make passwords secure.

step.name: 2FA general
step.goal: The student knows why 2FA is more secure than just a password.
step.behavior: Explain to the student what 2FA is and why it improves security of an account.
step.responseLength: extremely detailed, give at least 5 examples of 2FA mechanisms! Go through all of them one by one and explain in detail how they work!
step.personality: cold and rational, no emoji use
